meanings.definition: To surpass or outdo in fishing
meanings.sent1: She always manages to outfishing her brother when they go fishing together.
meanings.sent2: He outfishinged all his friends during the fishing competition.

meanings.sent5: The fisherman's goal was to outfishing all others and become the champion of the lake.

meanings.definition: The act of catching more fish than someone else
meanings.sent1: His consistent outfishing of his friends made him the fishing champion.
meanings.sent2: During the tournament, her outfishing skills were unmatched.
meanings.sent3: The outfishing of the day brought a big smile to his face.

meanings.definition: The activity of fishing with better results than others
meanings.sent1: Their secret technique led to their consistent outfishing of the other anglers.
